7683bcf3-26c7-4f5e-ac0d-e214d718128a.name: JD - NUMA Opt - Opt VM Sockets
7683bcf3-26c7-4f5e-ac0d-e214d718128a.formula: (${this, metric=config|hardware|memoryKB}/1024/1024) <= (sum(${adaptertype=VMWARE, objecttype=HostSystem, metric=hardware|memorySize, depth=-1})/1024/1024)/sum(${adaptertype=VMWARE, objecttype=HostSystem, attribute=hardware|cpuInfo|numCpuPackages, depth=-1})      ?  ((${this, metric=config|hardware|numCpu} as vmCPUs) % 2           ?  vmCPUs          : vmCPUs + 1)  <=     (sum(${adaptertype=VMWARE, objecttype=HostSystem, attribute=hardware|cpuInfo|numCpuCores, depth=-1}) / sum(${adaptertype=VMWARE, objecttype=HostSystem, metric=hardware|cpuInfo|numCpuPackages,      depth=-1}))           ?             1           : ceil(vmCPUs/(sum(${adaptertype=VMWARE, objecttype=HostSystem, attribute=hardware|cpuInfo|numCpuCores, depth=-1}) / sum(${adaptertype=VMWARE, objecttype=HostSystem, metric=hardware|cpuInfo|numCpuPackages, depth=-1})))     : ceil((${this, metric=config|hardware|memoryKB}/1024/1024) / ((sum(${adaptertype=VMWARE, objecttype=HostSystem, metric=hardware|memorySize, depth=-1})/1024/1024)/sum(${adaptertype=VMWARE, objecttype=HostSystem, attribute=hardware|cpuInfo|numCpuPackages, depth=-1})))

ad36a282-5860-4a11-8e21-16c21e174c67.name: JD - NUMA Opt - Opt VM Cores per Socket
ad36a282-5860-4a11-8e21-16c21e174c67.formula: ceil(${this, metric=config|hardware|numCpu})/((${this, metric=config|hardware|memoryKB}/1024/1024) <= (sum(${adaptertype=VMWARE, objecttype=HostSystem, metric=hardware|memorySize, depth=-1})/1024/1024)/sum(${adaptertype=VMWARE, objecttype=HostSystem, attribute=hardware|cpuInfo|numCpuPackages, depth=-1})      ?  ((${this, metric=config|hardware|numCpu} as vmCPUs) % 2           ?  vmCPUs          : vmCPUs + 1)  <=     (sum(${adaptertype=VMWARE, objecttype=HostSystem, attribute=hardware|cpuInfo|numCpuCores, depth=-1}) / sum(${adaptertype=VMWARE, objecttype=HostSystem, metric=hardware|cpuInfo|numCpuPackages,      depth=-1}))           ?             1           : ceil(vmCPUs/(sum(${adaptertype=VMWARE, objecttype=HostSystem, attribute=hardware|cpuInfo|numCpuCores, depth=-1}) / sum(${adaptertype=VMWARE, objecttype=HostSystem, metric=hardware|cpuInfo|numCpuPackages, depth=-1})))     : ceil((${this, metric=config|hardware|memoryKB}/1024/1024) / ((sum(${adaptertype=VMWARE, objecttype=HostSystem, metric=hardware|memorySize, depth=-1})/1024/1024)/sum(${adaptertype=VMWARE, objecttype=HostSystem, attribute=hardware|cpuInfo|numCpuPackages, depth=-1}))))
